item.title: Beautiful Open Source
item.description: Earlier today, HP announced that they are open sourcing webOS, the mobile OS that they bought from Palm, inspired by BeOS, which Palm acquired a few years before that. Of course, these news comes as a consequence of HP canning their hardware platform, ending their tablet ambitions in a spectacular fire sale where they lost money on every device sold. I've been a fan of the simplicity and elegance of webOS for a while.

item.title: 2008: A year of OSM edits
item.description: Amazing demonstration of the power of the net. OpenStreetMap.org still has some way to go, but I think it's one of the more interesting open projects out there.
